name: Subway Simulator 2 - London
description:
Subway Simulator 3D – now in London!
Travel throughout the London Tube - take the driver's seat and drive the train by yourself.

How to play?

Make doors open/close
- Pick up as many passengers as you can
- Track your speed or get fined
- Use the warning signal when necessary
- Unlock new trains and routes.

Subway Simulator - London Underground features:
- True-to-life underground train simulation;
- Possibility to open/close doors, set speed, drive and use the siren;
- Passengers tracking;
- Realistic 3D graphics;
- Fines for over-speeding.

DISCLAIMER
The appearance of the maps and stations presented in this game may be inaccurate. The developer disclaims any responsibility for possible inaccuracies.
